intro: Say the wrong words, pay the price
description:
Step into abandoned rooms where whispers crawl along the walls and shadows refuse to behave. Your job isn’t to shoot first—it’s to investigate, identify what’s haunting the place, and perform the right rituals before fear, doubt, or something far worse overwhelms you.

Search for signs of possession, gather sacred tools, and piece together what kind of entity you’re dealing with. Every spirit behaves differently, every location tells a story, and one wrong ritual can turn a cleansing into a catastrophe.

This is survival through knowledge, nerves, and preparation. The horror creeps slowly, testing your focus as much as your courage. Stay calm, follow the rites, and remember—panic is exactly what the demon wants.

Because sometimes the scariest part isn’t what’s haunting the house…
it’s whether you’re strong enough to send it away.
